name: NetvueLiveVideo
0:
”Alexa, show my living room”
”Alexa, hide my living room”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can view your Netvue camera and doorbell at anytime from anywhere with Alexa.

To get started, enable this skill, login with your Netvue or Vuebell account, and say "Alexa, show my living room" or whatever you named your device.
 
The following Netvue camera and doorbell are supported:
-Netvue home camera
-Netvue Orb camera
-Netvue floodlight camera
-Netvue panoramic camera
-Vuebell
-Netvue belle

Get full instructions online:http://resource.netvue.com/alexa_instruction/en/index.html
